name: Breakout Space Ball Adventure
description:
Use the ball to break the bricks with the help of many different power-ups. Play through 8 different worlds, each one with it’s unique levels and a boss fight at the end of each world. This game aims to recreate the classic breakout gameplay with a modern touch and some new features such as the power up system or the boss fights. Enjoy the various levels with addictively simple controls. 

[Main Features]

- Alternative approach of the brick breaking / breakout games.

- 8 different worlds each one ending with a epic boss fight.

- Buff and debuff system to enhance the gameplay.

- Epic synthwave/retrowave music.

- Pixel art graphics reminding the classic golden era of the arcade games.

- CRT filter emulating the effect of the old TV.

- Simple controls making the game very easy to play for anyone.

- No network required.

[How to play]

- Touch the screen to shoot the ball in the desired direction.

- Drag your finger across the screen to move the pad.

- Don’t allow the ball to go below the screen, make it bounce with the pad.

- Hit bricks with the ball to destroy them.

- Break all bricks or defeat the boss to advance to the next level.

- Grab power up to gain temporary abilities that will help you to destroy blocks.

- Avoig grabbing the debuffs as they will make it harder for you to destroy bricks.

- When no more balls are available, you lose a life and another ball is spawned.

- Game Over is reached when you do not have more extra lifes available.

[Notice]

- This game is free and is maintained with some ads.

- Data is saved on the device, so changing the device will reset the game saved data.
